sentences.sContent: He was engaged in subversive activities .

remMethod.val: sub(在…下面) + vers(转) + ive(形容词后缀) → 在下面翻转的 → 颠覆性的

trans.tranOther: subversive ideas, activities etc are secret and intended to damage or destroy a government or an established system
someone who secretly tries to damage or destroy the government or an established system
